ProjectTitle: Novel surface tailoring of innovative dental zirconia implants for improved osseointegration and soft-tissue attachment
InitialFeedbackHistory: 19/03/2024 [REDACTED] you checked the box dual use, this refers to research with potential for military use or misuse, this sounds unlikely based on your abstract, please correct this if this is a mistake and also check if this is correctly indicated in the CMT (https://www.groupware.kuleuven.be/sites/cmt/Pages/default.aspx). [REDACTED] consult the flowchart on https://set.kuleuven.be/ethicsatarenberg/expertise-center-ethics-arenberg-1/copy_of_dual-use/dual-use to see if you have to take additional measures [REDACTED] [REDACTED] answer that RDR gives a DOI under the question whether your data get a PID but you don't mention depositing data in RDR for sharing, please make sure that the information is consistent throughout your DMP
